'''''Dragon Magazine''''' was an official magazine for the [[Dungeons and Dragons|Dungeons & Dragons]] role-playing game. It launched in [[1976]] and ran until [[2013]]. Throughout its run, it was published by [[TSR]], [[Wizards of the Coast]], and Paizo under various forms. Despite its primary focus, ''Dragon Magazine'' also served as a broader fantasy periodical, reviewing other role-playing games, fantasy literature, and various related properties. Notably, [[Middle-earth Role Playing]] often utilized the magazine's back cover for its advertisements.<ref>[[Wikipedia:Kim Mohan|Kim Mohan]], “The source's mouth” in Dragon #85, p. 2</ref>
